name: Check-in
messageText: ${greeting} ${guestFirst}, and welcome to ${company}! ${roomNumber} is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay, and let is know if you need anything.

name: Check-out
messageText: ${greeting} ${guestFirst}, and we hope you enjoyed your stay with us at ${company}! We have emailed you a receipt for your stay. If you have any feedback about room ${roomNumber} we would love to hear from you. Have a safe trip home!

name: Check-out reminder
messageText: ${greeting} ${guestFirst}, we hope you are enjoying your stay at ${company}. We currently have you scheduled to checkout tomorrow, ${endTime}. Please let the front desk know if you need to modify your reservation. Otherwise, we hope you will join us for breakfast in the common room prior to your departure.

name: Extra Pillow Request
messageText: ${greeting} ${guestFirst}, we hope you are enjoying your stay at ${company}! We have recieved your request for extra pillows and will be delivering them shortly to your room ${roomNumber}. Please let us know if there is anything else you need.

name: Guest Recovery - Comp Food
messageText: ${greeting} ${guestFirst}, we are very sorry to hear that you had an issue with room ${roomNumber}. Here at ${company} we never want our guests to feel uncomfortable in any way during your stay. Due to the inconvenience you have experienced, have left a gift certifcate in your room for a complimentary dinner at our attached 5 star restaurant. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to provide you with the experience you deserve.

name: Guest Recovery - Comp Room
messageText: ${greeting} ${guestFirst}, we sincerely apologize you were not fully satisfied with your stay at ${company} in room ${roomNumber}. We never want our guests to feel uncomfortable in any way while staying with us, and we greatly appreciate your feedback. Please be assured we have issued you a full refund for last night to the card on file. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you at this time.
